lines.text: Oh, professor, do you also make a habit of collecting coffins?
Why, yes, in a manner of speaking. I find a coffin much more comfortable than a bed.
Aww, now wait a minute. Are you trying to tell me that this Professor Lorenz is a hypnotist as well as a horticulturist?
These young girls, whether dead or alive, are being used by Lorenz in some manner as human guinea pigs to sustain his wife in a youthful state.
It's nothing of the kind. Scientists are finding out every day that glands and hormones have a lot to do with life and health.
The glands in our bodies help to determine the condition of our teeth, the texture of our hair.
Why do you beat my son so hard?
Because he's at best an animal, and some day I shall have to destroy him.
My poor son!... Why was he ever born?
You see, our dreams, our minds play strange tricks on us sometimes!
